name: Let Off - Pursuit car game
description:
They are chasing you. Try to escape! Avoid the traffic or the elements that you find on the road, cause the accident of your pursuers.

Circuit 1 and 2:
- To change the direction, tap the screen.
- To activate the turbo, touch the screen.

Circuit 3:
- Tap left or right part of the screen to turn.

For Apple Watch, roll the Digital Crown wheel to turn.

How far can you go?
